replies.body: I honestly hate these videos. I'm so sorry for being born in 2003. They make all young "gamers" look like whiney sensitive bitches. These videos are the reason why I lie about my age on almost every other server but Avicus, because avicus is the only place I feel safe saying my age. Remember ACTenisAC? That redstone master. He sounded like a 9 year old, so people thought it was a good idea to bully him for that.

Also imho hyperscale is a waste of money. You could get a much better spawn for free with the help of Para, Evo, and a few other builders.
